Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor onboarding flow and clean up dashboard components

- Remove deprecated my-dashboard page and components

- Add UserPlanContext for centralized plan state management
- Update auth routes, callbacks, and verification flow
- Update product-hunt components and product card styling
- Update AI toolkit pages and components
- Update landing-v2 and seasonal collections components
- Add database migration for flattened onboarding videos
- Update middleware and various hooks

EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Clean up public folder and remove from git tracking

- Remove public folder from git tracking \(already in .gitignore\)
- Clean up unused assets: icons, demo-products, winning-products
- Fix 3d-ecom-icons-blue path \(moved from nested public/public\)
- Remove duplicate category folders and unused mascot images
- Remove unused SVGs and thumbnail images
- Videos folder excluded from build and git
